timeline.message: Hide array to prevent external mutations
Prevent external mutations to location data

timeline.bodyText: This appears to have been unused.
timeline.author: triceo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -68,53 +73,10 @@
             new LocationData("STR", 48.69, 9.221944),

replies.bodyText: Please don't throw it away, it was used for the europe40 dataset and it was a PITA to collect that data.
replies.author: ge0ffrey
